results.question: When will my root canal claim of Rs 25,000 be settled?
results.answer: Information not found in the document.

results.question: I have done an IVF for Rs 56,000. Is it covered?
results.answer: Expenses related to assisted reproduction services, including IVF, are not covered under the policy.

results.question: I did a cataract treatment of Rs 100,000. Will you settle full?
results.answer: Your cataract treatment of Rs 100,000 will be settled at 25% of the Sum Insured or INR 40,000 per eye, whichever is lower, per eye in one Policy Period.

results.question: Give me a list of documents to be uploaded for hospitalization due to heart surgery.
results.answer: For hospitalization due to heart surgery, documents to be uploaded include a duly completed claim form, photo identity proof of the patient, medical practitionerâ€™s prescription advising admission, original itemized bills and payment receipts, discharge summary, investigation/diagnostic test reports, OT notes or surgeon's certificate, implant invoices, MLR/FIR if applicable, NEFT details and a cancelled cheque, KYC of the proposer if claim is over Rs. 1 Lakh, and any other relevant document required by the Company/TPA.

results.question: I have raised a claim for hospitalization for Rs 25,000. What will I get?
results.answer: Information not found in the document.
